name: Dreamfall: The Longest Journey
description:
This script will facilitate you install of this game on Linux OS:
"Dreamfall - The Longest Journey" provided by GOG.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions on Linux platform.
notes:
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.gogsetup: N/A:Please select the Windows setup exe file downloaded from your GOG account.

write_file.content:
# Automatically generated Shark 3D Snake 1x0 Text Stream. Format: ascii.
height $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT
width $RESOLUTION_WIDTH
depth 32
verticalsync 1
fullscreen 1
aspect 0
textcode "en"
audiocode "en"

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Dreamfall - The Longest Journey"; rm -f -r ../tmp __support goggame-1207659045* webcache.zip ;

content:
custom-name: Dreamfall - The Longest Journey - GOG
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gogsetup: N/A:Please select the Windows setup exe file downloaded from your GOG
    account.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dreamfall - The Longest Journey/dreamfall.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games" "$gogsetup"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Dreamfall - The Longest Journey/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/app
- write_file:
    content: '# Automatically generated Shark 3D Snake 1x0 Text Stream. Format: ascii.

      height $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT

      width $RESOLUTION_WIDTH

      depth 32

      verticalsync 1

      fullscreen 1

      aspect 0

      textcode "en"

      audiocode "en" '
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Dreamfall - The Longest Journey/prefs.dat
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Dreamfall - The Longest Journey"; rm -f
      -r ../tmp __support goggame-1207659045* webcache.zip ;
wine:
  Desktop: true
